alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 8:43PM CDT until March 26 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County. Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Overbank flooding is occurring in the steens area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning and crest at 15.1 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Luxapallila Creek Columbus 15.0 10.2 Wed 8 pm CDT 14.1 15.0 12.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 845 AM CDT.
